compliant.section: ECS will not disclose, sell or provide your Information to any third party except the situations stated in this Policy and the following exceptions . With your consent .
To comply with laws and regulations or governmental requests .

To prevent, investigate, detect or prosecute criminal offences or attacks on the technical integrity of the Website or our network . To protect the rights, property, or safety of ECS, the users of the Website, or the public .

ECS reserves the right to provide such Information to our officers, employees, contractors, agents, and designees to the extent necessary to enable them to execute certain web services(such as web hosting or maintenance services) for us .
All transfer, storage and use of your Information shall be subject to this Policy and applicable laws on privacy protection and personal information security .
compliant.legal provisions: Transfers of personal data to third countries or international organisations

compliant.section: You can set your browser to notify you when you receive a cookie, giving you the chance to decide whether or not to accept it .

non_compliant.section: Application information: Such as the type of your installed applications or software, your usage and interaction with content offered through Website, for instance, the install and uninstall time, frequency of your usage, the category of your preferred applications and software .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Data minimisation
non_compliant.amend: Specify the specific and limited purposes for collecting application information and ensure it's directly necessary for those purposes.

non_compliant.section: How ECS use Information ECS may use Information we collect for the purposes below: To respond to your inquiries that you request. To upgrade the quality of the Website . To assess and improve the services that ECS provides over the Website . To obtain customer feedback and to analyze user experience for the purpose of development and evaluation of new services and devices . Any other purposes with your consent .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Purpose limitation
non_compliant.amend: Clearly define and separate legitimate purposes for data use. Avoid vague terms like 'upgrade the quality' and provide specific, legitimate reasons for each use case.

non_compliant.section: Information regarding your traffic patterns may be aggregated to compile a web transaction report showing web-traffic related information, but in no event shall ECS use any of your web-traffic related information for any purpose beyond this Policy .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Storage limitation
non_compliant.amend: Define specific retention periods for web traffic data and ensure it's deleted or anonymized once its purpose is fulfilled.

non_compliant.section: Use of Cookies In order to improve our Website, ECS may use "cookies" to track your visit . A cookie is small amount of data that is transferred to your browser by a web server and can only be read by the server that gave it to you . It functions as your identification card, recording your passwords, purchases, and preferences . It cannot be executed as code or deliver viruses . Most browsers are initially set to accept cookies .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data: Fairness and transparency, Conditions for consent: Unambiguous indication of wishes
non_compliant.amend: Provide users with clear and concise information about the use of cookies, including their purpose, type, and duration. Obtain explicit consent before setting non-essential cookies.
